OnlyLive.label: Only when live
OnlyLive.tooltip: Command is only active when stream is live

Command.label: Command Name
Command.tooltip: The command the bot will respond to

Permission.label: Permission level
Permission.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

PermissionInfo.label: Permission level info
PermissionInfo.tooltip: Set the user, rank or tier for permission

OnCooldown.value: {0} the command is still on cooldown for {1} seconds!
OnCooldown.label: Cooldown Response
OnCooldown.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on cooldown. 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = time remaining

OnUserCooldown.value: {0} the command is still on user cooldown for {1} seconds!
OnUserCooldown.label: User Cooldown Response
OnUserCooldown.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on user cooldown. 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = time remaining

BaseResponsewin.label: Win message
BaseResponsewin.tooltip:
{0} = user 
 {1} = target 
 {2} = stolen amount 
 {3} = currency name

BaseResponselose.value: {0} was caught trying to steal from {1}!! {1} agreed to settle for {2} {3} to not call one of the mods!
BaseResponselose.label: Loss message

BaseResponsefail.value: {0} has failed to steal from {1}, but {0} was never caught in the attempt!
BaseResponsefail.label: Fail message

BaseResponsetimeout.value: {0} was caught trying to steal from {1}!! {1} refused to settle, and called one of the mods! {0} was timedout for {2} seconds! RIP!
BaseResponsetimeout.label: Timeout message

NotEnoughResponse.value: {0} or {1} do not have {4} {2} to attempt stealing!
NotEnoughResponse.label: Not enough currency response
NotEnoughResponse.tooltip:
Message sent when user doesn't have enough points! 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = target 
 {2} = currency name 
 {3} = command 
 {4} = max steal

targeted.label: Targeted Stealing
targeted.tooltip: Targeted means a specific name has to be after the command, Random steals from a random viewer, and Both will target a specific viewer (if name provided) or steals at random (if not)
